new SSH and SFTP adaptors based on the Ganymed library. URL prefixes have not changed ("ssh" for job and "sftp" for data). If you have a dependency on the ssh adaptor, use the artifactId "jsaga-adaptor-ssh3". The new SSH adaptor is compatible with the old SSH adaptor, except that the attribute "UserKey" has been replaced by "UserPrivateKey". It is still possible to use the old SSH adaptor ("jsaga-adaptor-ssh") with a context of type "DEPRECATED-SSH", and URL prefixes like "deprecated-ssh" and "deprecated-sftp". "jsaga-adaptor-ssh" is deprecated and will be removed in a future release.
